Haon

Introduction

HAON is a South Korean rapper under KC. He made his solo debut on June 28, 2018, with the digital single "Love! Dance!"
Following his win on High School Rapper 2, he signed with H1GHR Music on May 11, 2018, and left on May 8, 2023.

Fun facts

1
When HAON won High School Rapper 2, he got 10 million won ($8,900). He gave his parents 1 million won ($895) each, but now he thinks he should’ve given them more.
